alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Outflow winds from decaying showers and storms will impact portions of southeastern Yuma County in northeastern Colorado, Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas and southwestern Dundy Counties in southwestern Nebraska through 630 PM MDT/730 PM CDT/... At 601 PM MDT/701 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Haigler to 11 miles west of St. Francis to 3 miles southeast of Bonny Reservoir. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Haigler around 605 PM MDT. St. Francis around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
